== About Frostbridge ==

 * Written in [http://www.scala-lang.org/ Scala]
 * Statically typed data binding
 * Works with user-defined classes/traits: doesn't interfere or impose requirements on user data types
 * Encourages immutable objects
 * No schema involved (i.e., this is not a port of JAXB)
 * Datatypes can be customized or new datatypes can be created
 * Uses [http://woodstox.codehaus.org/ Woodstox] XML pull parser
 * API documentation generated by [http://code.google.com/p/vscaladoc/ vscaladoc]
 * Tests use [http://code.google.com/p/scalacheck/ scalacheck]
 * Built with [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven]
 * LGPL (v2.1 or higher) license
